languages.text: Вольный Торговец заявил{mf||а} свое право на десятину с Летуса — все, до последней крохи было потрачено во имя Империума. Возводились соборы, строились крепости против врагов Человечества, снаряжались целые армии. Однако другие династии заклеймили фон Валанциус узурпатором десятины и отказались впредь выплачивать священную подать. И без того шаткий мир между Вольными Торговцами был непоправимо нарушен.
languages.translation_comment:
Всю десятину забрали себе
догматик
или забрали десятину и доминирует догматик соулмарка

Всю десятину забрали себе
догматик
или забрали десятину и доминирует догматик соулмарка

languages.text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец заявил{mf||а} свое право на десятину с Летуса — все, до последней крохи было потрачено во имя Империума. Возводились соборы, строились крепости против врагов Человечества, снаряжались целые армии. Однако другие династии заклеймили фон Валанциус узурпатором десятины и отказались впредь выплачивать священную подать. И без того шаткий мир между Вольными Торговцами был непоправимо нарушен.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected. Fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies. Entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties branded House von Valancius a tithe usurper and thenceforth refused to pay the sacred tribute. The already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond repair.

However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} nahm {mf|sein|ihr} Recht auf den Leethus-Zehnt in Anspruch. Alles, bis zum letzten Krümel, wurde im Namen des Imperiums ausgegeben. Kathedralen wurden erbaut, Festungen zur Verteidigung gegen die Feinde der Menschheit, ganze Armeen wurden neu rekrutiert und ausgerüstet. Doch schon bald beschimpften andere Dynastien das Haus Valancius als Zehnt-Erschleicher, weigerten sich, den heiligen Tribut zu entrichten, und der ohnehin wackelige Frieden zwischen den Freihändlern war irreparabel zerstört.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} nahm {mf|sein|ihr} Recht auf den Leethus-Zehnt in Anspruch. Alles, bis zum letzten Krümel, wurde im Namen des Imperiums ausgegeben. Kathedralen wurden erbaut, Festungen zur Verteidigung gegen die Feinde der Menschheit, ganze Armeen wurden neu rekrutiert und ausgerüstet. Doch schon bald beschimpften andere Dynastien das Haus Valancius als Zehnt-Erschleicher, weigerten sich, den heiligen Tribut zu entrichten, und der ohnehin wackelige Frieden zwischen den Freihändlern war irreparabel zerstört.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} fit valoir son droit sur la dîme de Leethus. Tout, jusqu'au dernier centime, fut dépensé au nom de l'Imperium : cathédrales, forteresses pour se défendre des ennemis de l'Humanité, armées entières recrutées et équipées… D'autres dynasties accusèrent bientôt la maison von Valancius d'usurper la dîme et refusèrent de payer le tribut sacré, mettant irrémédiablement à mal la paix déjà fragile instaurée par les libres-marchands.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} fit valoir son droit sur la dîme de Leethus. Tout, jusqu'au dernier centime, fut dépensé au nom de l'Imperium : cathédrales, forteresses pour se défendre des ennemis de l'Humanité, armées entières recrutées et équipées… D'autres dynasties accusèrent bientôt la maison von Valancius d'usurper la dîme et refusèrent de payer le tribut sacré, mettant irrémédiablement à mal la paix déjà fragile instaurée par les libres-marchands.

languages.text: 行商浪人将所有帝国什一税据为己有，将所有资源都用来建设帝国，哪怕是一丁点面包渣都没有中饱私囊。无数教堂与要塞拔地而起，用来抵御人类之敌，而许多新兵也应征入伍，配备了优良的装备。不过，其他行商浪人王朝却将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝视为篡夺什一税的罪犯。在这件事情之后，他们拒绝缴纳任何神圣什一税。行商浪人之间原本早已岌岌可危的平衡，如今被彻底打破。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将所有帝国什一税据为己有，将所有资源都用来建设帝国，哪怕是一丁点面包渣都没有中饱私囊。无数教堂与要塞拔地而起，用来抵御人类之敌，而许多新兵也应征入伍，配备了优良的装备。不过，其他行商浪人王朝却将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝视为篡夺什一税的罪犯。在这件事情之后，他们拒绝缴纳任何神圣什一税。行商浪人之间原本早已岌岌可危的平衡，如今被彻底打破。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ejerció su derecho sobre el diezmo de Leethus. Todo, hasta la última moneda, se utilizó en nombre del Imperium. Se erigieron catedrales, se construyeron fortalezas para defender a la Humanidad frente a sus enemigos y se reclutaron y equiparon nuevos ejércitos al completo. Sin embargo, las otras dinastías no tardaron en condenar a la casa von Valancius como usurpadora del diezmo y se negaron a pagar el santo tributo, poniendo fin a la inestable paz entre los Comerciantes Independientes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ejerció su derecho sobre el diezmo de Leethus. Todo, hasta la última moneda, se utilizó en nombre del Imperium. Se erigieron catedrales, se construyeron fortalezas para defender a la Humanidad frente a sus enemigos y se reclutaron y equiparon nuevos ejércitos al completo. Sin embargo, las otras dinastías no tardaron en condenar a la casa von Valancius como usurpadora del diezmo y se negaron a pagar el santo tributo, poniendo fin a la inestable paz entre los Comerciantes Independientes.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーはリーザスの租税への権利を主張した。最後の一欠片に至るまで、そのすべてが帝国の名のもとに使われた。大聖堂が建てられ、人類の敵に備えるための要塞が築かれ、新たな軍隊が募集され装備された。しかし、他の王朝は間もなくフォン・ヴァランシウス家を「租税の簒奪者」と非難し、それ以降、聖なる租税の支払いを拒むようになった。すでに不安定だったローグトレーダー間の和平は、もはや修復不可能なほどに損なわれた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーはリーザスの租税への権利を主張した。最後の一欠片に至るまで、そのすべてが帝国の名のもとに使われた。大聖堂が建てられ、人類の敵に備えるための要塞が築かれ、新たな軍隊が募集され装備された。しかし、他の王朝は間もなくフォン・ヴァランシウス家を「租税の簒奪者」と非難し、それ以降、聖なる租税の支払いを拒むようになった。すでに不安定だったローグトレーダー間の和平は、もはや修復不可能なほどに損なわれた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Leethus aşarı üzerinde hak iddia etti. Tüm aşar son zerresine kadar İmparatorluk namına harcandı. Katedraller dikildi, insanlığın düşmanlarına karşı kaleler inşa edildi, yepyeni ordular toplandı ve bu ordular sağlam ekipmanlarla donatıldı. Ancak çok geçmeden diğer hanedanlıklar, von Valancius Hanesi'ni aşar hırsızı olarak damgaladı. O andan itibaren kutsal aşarı ödemeyi reddettiler ve Hür Tacirler arasındaki hâlihazırda sallantıda olan barış, onarılamayacak şekilde zarar gördü.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader asserted {mf|his|her} right to the Leethus tithe. All of it, down to the last crumb, was spent in the name of the Imperium. Cathedrals were erected; fortresses were built to defend against Humanity's enemies; entire new armies were recruited and equipped. However, other dynasties soon branded House von Valancius as a tithe usurper, thenceforth refusing to pay the sacred tribute, and the already shaky peace between the Rogue Traders was damaged beyond all repair.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, Leethus aşarı üzerinde hak iddia etti. Tüm aşar son zerresine kadar İmparatorluk namına harcandı. Katedraller dikildi, insanlığın düşmanlarına karşı kaleler inşa edildi, yepyeni ordular toplandı ve bu ordular sağlam ekipmanlarla donatıldı. Ancak çok geçmeden diğer hanedanlıklar von Valancius Hanesi'ni aşar hırsızı olarak damgaladı. O andan itibaren kutsal aşarı ödemeyi reddettiler ve Hür Tacirler arasındaki hâlihazırda sallantıda olan barış, onarılamayacak şekilde zarar gördü.
